name: Ollidatorgs
description:
In this fun game you will be faced with ollidatorgs. KILL THEM ALL they"re just very dangerous pests. 

The objective is to kill the mouths of the earth with your life.

You can spawn enemies called grotadillos to defend yourself and kill mouths theywill attack ollidatorgs... but be careful if theres no ollidatorgs, you are the grotadillos lunch!
